title: Order relative to authorizing the joint committee on Election Laws to make an investigation and study of a certain current Senate document relative to federal child labor constitutional amendment.

abstracts.abstract: The committee on Election Laws, to whom was referred the petitions (accompanied by resolve, Senate, No. 521) of Vincent Dixon, for legislation to support ratification of Federal Child Labor Constitutional Amendment, report the accompanying Order  (Senate, No. 2650).

actions.description: Reported from the committee on Election Laws
Order reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on Rules of the two branches, acting concurrently

related_entities.name: committee on Rules of the two branches, acting concurrently
the committee on Rules of the two branches, acting concurrently

actions.description: Discharged to the committee on Senate Rules
